name: Chicken Coup (nguyenhanson1, C.Culver, Kale_Eos, graysire, JustinCheung6, Jessica Wei)
name_original: Chicken Coup (nguyenhanson1, C.Culver, Kale_Eos, graysire, JustinCheung6, Jessica Wei)
description:
FLIGHTLESS ACADEMY
Welcome, bawker, to the Flightless Academy! We salute you for leaving your coop and joining us in the ranks of the Chicken Coup.

MISSION
We bawkers of the Chicken Coup must fulfill our duty and reign supreme over all barn peasants. You will have the honor of flying solo for this mission. The more peasants you shoot down, the closer we are to world domination!

Fly swiftly, bawker. We thank you for your service.
Please try your best not to end up on a finger lick’n good commercial.
